title: The Making of a Matriot
description: Matriot (ma' - tri - at) noun 1. One who loves his or her country. 2. One who loves and protects the people of his or her country. 3. One who perceives national defense as health, education, and shelter for all people in his or her country, and the world. (Orig. FPA, 1991)
author: Frances Payne Adler
